trans-unit.source: To manage your app's ad campaigns, click Monetization > Promote your app from your app's page in the Windows Dev Center dashboard.
trans-unit.target: To manage your app's ad campaigns, click Monetization > Promote your app from your app's page in the Windows Dev Center dashboard.

trans-unit.source: Managing your ad campaign
trans-unit.target: Managing your ad campaign

trans-unit.source: Managing your ad campaign
trans-unit.target: Managing your ad campaign

trans-unit.source: To manage your app's ad campaigns, click **Monetization** > **Promote your app** from your app's page in the Windows Dev Center dashboard.
trans-unit.target: To manage your app's ad campaigns, click **Monetization** > **Promote your app** from your app's page in the Windows Dev Center dashboard.

trans-unit.source: The **Promote your app** page lists all of the ad campaigns associated with your app and displays the impressions, clicks, and installs for each ad campaign.
trans-unit.target: The **Promote your app** page lists all of the ad campaigns associated with your app and displays the impressions, clicks, and installs for each ad campaign.

trans-unit.source: For more information about impressions, clicks, and installs, see the definitions for these terms in [App install ads report](app-install-ads-reports.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information about impressions, clicks, and installs, see the definitions for these terms in [App install ads report](app-install-ads-reports.md).

trans-unit.source: To filter the list of ad campaigns, click the **Section filters** drop-down and choose from the following filters:
trans-unit.target: To filter the list of ad campaigns, click the **Section filters** drop-down and choose from the following filters:

trans-unit.source: **Date**: This specifies the data range for impressions, clicks, and installs that are associated with the ad campaigns.
trans-unit.target: **Date**: This specifies the data range for impressions, clicks, and installs that are associated with the ad campaigns.

trans-unit.source: **Status**: This specifies the status of the ad campaigns:
trans-unit.target: **Status**: This specifies the status of the ad campaigns:

trans-unit.source: **Active** indicates that the ad campaign is running and processing data.
trans-unit.target: **Active** indicates that the ad campaign is running and processing data.

trans-unit.source: To temporarily pause an ad campaign, click **Pause** in the **Action** column of the ad campaigns table.
trans-unit.target: To temporarily pause an ad campaign, click **Pause** in the **Action** column of the ad campaigns table.

trans-unit.source: **Paused** indicates that the ad campaign is temporarily on hold and not processing data.
trans-unit.target: **Paused** indicates that the ad campaign is temporarily on hold and not processing data.

trans-unit.source: To resume an ad campaign, click **Resume** in the **Action** column of the ad campaigns table.
trans-unit.target: To resume an ad campaign, click **Resume** in the **Action** column of the ad campaigns table.

trans-unit.source: **Ended** indicates that the ad campaign has reached the end date you specified when you created or last modified the ad campaign.
trans-unit.target: **Ended** indicates that the ad campaign has reached the end date you specified when you created or last modified the ad campaign.

trans-unit.source: **Needs attention** indicates that the ad campaign has issues that need your attention, such as a billing failure or a custom ad design that failed validation.
trans-unit.target: **Needs attention** indicates that the ad campaign has issues that need your attention, such as a billing failure or a custom ad design that failed validation.

trans-unit.source: To fix the issues, click the text in the **Action** column of the ad campaigns table.
trans-unit.target: To fix the issues, click the text in the **Action** column of the ad campaigns table.

trans-unit.source: **Campaign type**: This specifies whether to display paid or [house](about-house-ads.md) ad campaigns.
trans-unit.target: **Campaign type**: This specifies whether to display paid or [house](about-house-ads.md) ad campaigns.

trans-unit.source: Report
trans-unit.target: Report

trans-unit.source: To see how your ad campaigns are performing, click **Analytics** > **App install ads** in the navigation pane of the dashboard.
trans-unit.target: To see how your ad campaigns are performing, click **Analytics** > **App install ads** in the navigation pane of the dashboard.

trans-unit.source: For more information about this report, see [App install ads report](app-install-ads-reports.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information about this report, see [App install ads report](app-install-ads-reports.md).

trans-unit.source: Edit an ad campaign
trans-unit.target: Edit an ad campaign

trans-unit.source: To make changes to an ad campaign, click its name to go to the details page for that ad campaign.
trans-unit.target: To make changes to an ad campaign, click its name to go to the details page for that ad campaign.

trans-unit.source: After you make changes, click **Review**, review the details, and then click **Confirm**.
trans-unit.target: After you make changes, click **Review**, review the details, and then click **Confirm**.

trans-unit.target: Related topics
